title: Captain Khan’s Epitaph: ‘Beware of Dying as an Apostate’
subtitle: Rumors claiming the epitaph on Capt. Humayun Khan's  headstone refers to him as an "apostate" are rooted in ISIS propaganda.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: The headstone of the late U.S. Army Capt. Humayun Khan (son of DNC speaker Khizr Khan) references his "dying as an apostate."
